hours._text: A warm, friendly welcome always with, at least a hot drink. Monthly Friday lunch club provides a hot meal and friendly company. With additional resource we will extend this more frequently. Ability to charge phones. Crafty cafe to start in January with all welcome and will include hot drinks and cakes – dates to be announced. We’ll encourage a book swap. Ad hoc events in planning include a Quiz Night on 27th January and a Pie & Pea supper with village history talk on17th February. All activities provided in the warm church hall (not the main church) which is used by the pre-school Monday to Thursdays in term time.

properties.title: Oakenshaw Resident’s Association
